channel.title: Trade logs for 317
channel.description:
Yes, I know. It is a nooby question.
But it is my first time working with logs so I need help to get myself started. I am using a boolean source that doesn't have any logs, and I want to add trade and chat.
Chat is fixed, but trade isn't. I want trade logs so I can look for duping. The thing is I don't know what I'm supposed to change or look for.
I think I need to add a BufferedWriter at the public void open trade, but I'm not sure.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Trade logs for 317
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

Yes, I know. It is a nooby question.

But it is my first time working with logs so I need help to get myself started. I am using a boolean source that doesn’t have any logs, and I want to add trade and chat.

Chat is fixed, but trade isn’t. I want trade logs so I can look for duping. The thing is I don’t know what I’m supposed to change or look for.

I think I need to add a BufferedWriter at the public void open trade, but I’m not sure.

Thanks in advance.
